tika-s0404t4:2_2: Chaṭṭhe pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṁ, pañcaṅgameva pañcaṅgikaṁ, tassa pañcaṅgikassa.
tika-s0404t4:2_3: Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti “cammapariyonaddhesū”ti visesanaṁ kataṁ.
tika-s0404t4:2_7: Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṁ nāma caturassaambaṇaṁ paṇavādi ca.
tika-s0404t4:2_20: Na nibbindatīti na tajjeti, sotasukhabhāvato piyāyitabbova hoti.
tika-s0404t4:3_0: Bhattāraṁ nātimaññatīti sāmikaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ manasāpi na pattheti.
tika-s0404t4:3_3: Saṅgahitaparijjanāti sammānanādīhi ceva chaṇādīsu pesetabba-piyabhaṇḍādipaṇṇākārapesanādīhi ca saṅgahitaparijanā.
tika-s0404t4:3_4: Idha parijano nāma sāmikassa ceva attano ca ñātijano.
tika-s0404t4:6_2: Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṁ sampādeti, so idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca.
tika-s0404t4:6_4: (Pasaṁsāvahato tayidaṁ pasaṁsāvahanaṁ kittisaddena idhaloke saddānaṁ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.) Susaṁvihitakammantoti yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṁ karaṇena suṭṭhu saṁvihitakammanto.
tika-s0404t4:6_6: Yo hi samparāyikaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṁ sampādeti, so paralokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti.
